content.text: Happygun is an infamous New World pirate who allied himself with Whitebeard.
He is a tall man with long black hair, a long pointed nose, and a triple pointed chin. He wears a purple coat with pink inner edges that exposes his chest.

In his original concept art, he wore a light colored coat with light colored buttons and lines at the end of the sleeves over a light colored vest underneath. Under the vest, he wore a button up white shirt. He also has a light colored sash and dark colored pants with long boots that go to his thighs.

Since Happygun was willing to put his life on the line to save Ace from execution, it can be deduced that Happygun is a person that values loyalty and friendship. Furthermore, since he was willing to brave the fight against Marine Headquarters, it can be concluded that Happygun is a daring and fearless pirate captain.

Happygun is a fearsome pirate who has managed to achieve an infamous reputation in the New World such that he was able to ally himself with Whitebeard. Nothing is known about his combat abilities, but it can be assumed that it is befitting of his status as an infamous pirate.
In the past, Happygun became a renowned pirate in the New World and allied himself with Whitebeard as a subordinate captain.

When Portgas D. Ace was to be executed at Marineford, Happygun and his crew joined forces with the Whitebeard Pirates in order to save him from execution. While the Marines were bracing for the arrival of the pirates, Happygun and the allied fleet of the 43 subordinate captains caught them by surprise when the fleet suddenly appeared out of nowhere just off the shores of Marineford.

After Ace was killed by Akainu, Jinbe tried to save Luffy from being killed by the Marine Admiral. However, to the shock and horror of Happygun, Ninth, and Colscon, Akainu was able to punch straight through Jinbe.
Afterwards, the Red Hair Pirates arrived and Sengoku ended the war, allowing the surviving pirates to leave.
